verses.verse: There was also a lot <WH1486> for the tribe <WH4294> of M'nasheh <WH4519>; for he was the firstborn <WH1060> of Yosef <WH3130>; to wit, for Machir <WH4353> the firstborn <WH1060> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, the father <WH1> of Gil`ad <WH1568>: because he was a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>, therefore he had Gil`ad <WH1568> and Bashan <WH1316>.

There was also a lot for the rest <WH3498> <WH8737> of the children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> by their families <WH4940>; for the children <WH1121> of Abiezer <WH44>, and for the children <WH1121> of Helek <WH2507>, and for the children <WH1121> of Asriel <WH844>, and for the children <WH1121> of SH'khem <WH7928>, and for the children <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, and for the children <WH1121> of Shemida <WH8061>: these were the male <WH2145> children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130> by their families <WH4940>.

But TZ'lof'chad <WH6765>, the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660>, the son <WH1121> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, had no sons <WH1121>, but daughters <WH1323>: and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters <WH1323>, Mahlah <WH4244>, and Noach <WH5270>, Hoglah <WH2295>, Milcah <WH4435>, and Tirzah <WH8656>.

And they came near <WH7126> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and before <WH6440> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and before <WH6440> the princes <WH5387>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> us an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> our brethren <WH251>. Therefore according to the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the brethren <WH251> of their father <WH1>.

And there fell <WH5307> <WH8799> ten <WH6235> portions <WH2256> to M'nasheh <WH4519>, beside the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568> and Bashan <WH1316>, which were on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>;

Because the daughters <WH1323> of M'nasheh <WH4519> had <WH5157> <WH8804> an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> his sons <WH1121>: and the rest <WH3498> <WH8737> of M'nasheh's <WH4519> sons <WH1121> had the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.

And the coast <WH1366> of M'nasheh <WH4519> was from Asher <WH836> to Michmethah <WH4366>, that lieth before <WH6440> SH'khem <WH7927>; and the border <WH1366> went along <WH1980> <WH8804> on the right hand <WH3225> unto the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Entappuah <WH5887>.
Now M'nasheh <WH4519> had the land <WH776> of Tappuah <WH8599>: but Tappuah <WH8599> on the border <WH1366> of M'nasheh <WH4519> belonged to the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669>;

And the coast <WH1366> descended <WH3381> <WH8804> unto the river <WH5158> Kanah <WH7071>, southward <WH5045> of the river <WH5158>: these cities <WH5892> of Efrayim <WH669> are among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> of M'nasheh <WH4519>: the coast <WH1366> of M'nasheh <WH4519> also was on the north side <WH6828> of the river <WH5158>, and the outgoings <WH8444> of it were at the sea <WH3220>:

Southward <WH5045> it was Efrayim's <WH669>, and northward <WH6828> it was M'nasheh's <WH4519>, and the sea <WH3220> is his border <WH1366>; and they met together <WH6293> <WH8799> in Asher <WH836> on the north <WH6828>, and in Yissakhar <WH3485> on the east <WH4217>.

And M'nasheh <WH4519> had in Yissakhar <WH3485> and in Asher <WH836> Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns <WH1323>, and Ibleam <WH2991> and her towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Dor <WH1756> and her towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Endor <WH5874> and her towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Taanach <WH8590> and her towns <WH1323>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns <WH1323>, even three <WH7969> countries <WH5316>.

Yet the children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not drive out <WH3423> <WH8687> the inhabitants of those cities <WH5892>; but the Kanahanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> <WH8686> dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in that land <WH776>.

Yet it came to pass, when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were waxen strong <WH2388> <WH8804>, that they put <WH5414> <WH8799> the Kanahanites <WH3669> to tribute <WH4522>; but did not utterly <WH3423> <WH8687> drive them out <WH3423> <WH8689>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Why hast thou given <WH5414> <WH8804> me but one <WH259> lot <WH1486> and one <WH259> portion <WH2256> to inherit <WH5159>, seeing I am a great <WH7227> people <WH5971>, forasmuch as <WH5704> the YY <WH3068> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> me hitherto <WH3541> ?

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> answered <WH559> <WH8799> them, If thou be a great <WH7227> people <WH5971>, then get thee up <WH5927> <WH8798> to the wood <WH3293> country, and cut down <WH1254> <WH8765> for thyself there in the land <WH776> of the Perizzites <WH6522> and of the giants <WH7497>, if mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669> be too narrow <WH213> <WH8804> for thee.

And the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799>, The hill <WH2022> is not enough <WH4672> <WH8735> for us: and all the Kanahanites <WH3669> that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776> of the valley <WH6010> have chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>, both they who are of Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns <WH1323>, and they who are of the valley <WH6010> of Yizre`el <WH3157>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130>, even to Efrayim <WH669> and to M'nasheh <WH4519>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thou art a great <WH7227> people <WH5971>, and hast great <WH1419> power <WH3581>: thou shalt not have one <WH259> lot <WH1486> only:

But the mountain <WH2022> shall be thine; for it is a wood <WH3293>, and thou shalt cut it down <WH1254> <WH8765>: and the outgoings <WH8444> of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive out <WH3423> <WH8686> the Kanahanites <WH3669>, though they have iron <WH1270> chariots <WH7393>, and though they be strong <WH2389>.
